Yes or no? I'm interested to see how well it works along side eoc

item.title: Legacy Combat
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

Only way runescape would have a chance to save them self is to remove eoc or at least have server set up for old combat style with the main game. They sank their game. They tried to follow every other game like WOW and such and it will never work because Blizzard has 5 games that have more then 3x the players runescape bring. Runescape has slowly became a dead game. All u ever see is maxed players or players just starting

Read full topic

item.title: Legacy Combat
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

As much as I prefer the old combat, this is bad idea because it divides pretty much everything. Just use one or the other, because having two different versions of quests, equipment bonuses, combat levels, special attacks, training areas, PVP, bosses, and minigames is not the smartest way to design a game.

Read full topic

item.title: Legacy Combat
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:6, topic:539475”]Gamebreaking imo.

Their profits must be reallllly falling. Every year it has been something new(SOF, Solumn, 07, now Legacy). They saw how the community negatively viewed micro-transactions which ultimately lead to 07. They have time into tweaking EOC(hell, last week they just started the testing of the updated EOC) and now they want to do legacy. What ever happened to weekly content? EOC still has it flaws, but they can be fixed. Instead of these updates trying to bring back old players, expand to advertising. US/Euorpe is a lost cause as consoles are king, but in South American countries where technology isn’t as caught up they could easily be king.[/quote]No, they’ve just realized the standard MMO design with the action bar isn’t going to work when there are other games with years of development behind them to beat in the PC gaming world. RuneScape is no longer a unique gameplay experience with EOC. I’m not saying this change will work, they already killed the game really hard, but advertising a bad gameplay experience wont work either. Everyone already knows about RuneScape and people just think it’s trash now.

Read full topic

item.title: Legacy Combat
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Gamebreaking imo.

Their profits must be reallllly falling. Every year it has been something new(SOF, Solumn, 07, now Legacy). They saw how the community negatively viewed micro-transactions which ultimately lead to 07. They have time into tweaking EOC(hell, last week they just started the testing of the updated EOC) and now they want to do legacy. What ever happened to weekly content? EOC still has it flaws, but they can be fixed. Instead of these updates trying to bring back old players, expand to advertising. US/Euorpe is a lost cause as consoles are king, but in South American countries where technology isn’t as caught up they could easily be king.

Read full topic

item.title: Legacy Combat
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Phaze One:

Current vote stats, unfortunately this looks like it will happen.

They held a QA session earlier that cleared up a lot of things.

[ul][li]EOC and Legacy cannot PVP against each other, and cannot play minigames together[/li]
[li]Several bosses that require an ability to kill cannot be killed with legacy[/li]
[li]Some bosses will be nerfed to make it possible to kill with legacy[/li]
[li]Bosses that are killed with legacy will have drop rates slightly tweaked to make up for the increased difficulty[/li]
[li]XP rates will be similar to eoc, but still lower[/li]
[li]Possible legacy only pvp worlds[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
